name: MSP_API_VERSION
description: Provides the MSP protocol version and the INAV API version.

name: MSP_FC_VARIANT
description: Identifies the flight controller firmware variant (e.g., INAV, Betaflight).

name: MSP_FC_VERSION
description: Provides the specific version number of the flight controller firmware.

name: MSP_BOARD_INFO
description: Provides information about the specific hardware board and its capabilities.

fields.name: hardwareRevision
fields.description: Hardware revision number. 0 if not detected (USE_HARDWARE_REVISION_DETECTION).

fields.name: osdSupport
fields.description: OSD chip type: 0=None, 2=Onboard (USE_OSD). INAV does not support slave OSD (1).

fields.name: commCapabilities
fields.description: Communication capabilities bitmask: Bit 0=VCP support (USE_VCP), Bit 1=SoftSerial support (USE_SOFTSERIAL1/2).

fields.name: targetNameLength
fields.description: Length of the target name string that follows.

fields.name: targetName
fields.description: Target name string (e.g., "MATEKF405"). Length given by previous field.

name: MSP_BUILD_INFO
description: Provides build date, time, and Git revision of the firmware.

name: MSP_INAV_PID
description: Retrieves legacy INAV-specific PID controller related settings. Many fields are now obsolete or placeholders.

fields.name: headingHoldRateLimit
fields.description: Max rate for heading hold P term (pidProfile()->heading_hold_rate_limit).

fields.name: headingHoldLpfFreq
fields.description: Fixed LPF frequency for heading hold error (HEADING_HOLD_ERROR_LPF_FREQ).

name: MSP_SET_INAV_PID
description: Sets legacy INAV-specific PID controller related settings.

name: MSP_NAME
description: Returns the user-defined craft name.

fields.name: craftName
fields.description: The craft name string (systemConfig()->craftName). Null termination is not explicitly sent, the length is determined by the payload size.

name: MSP_SET_NAME
description: Sets the user-defined craft name.

fields.name: craftName
fields.description: The new craft name string. Automatically null-terminated by the FC.

name: MSP_NAV_POSHOLD
description: Retrieves navigation position hold and general manual/auto flight parameters. Some parameters depend on the platform type (Multirotor vs Fixed Wing).

fields.name: maxAutoClimbRate
fields.description: Max climb rate in autonomous modes (uses fw.max_auto_climb_rate or mc.max_auto_climb_rate based on platform).

fields.name: maxManualSpeed
fields.description: Max speed in manual modes with GPS aiding (navConfig()->general.max_manual_speed).

fields.name: maxManualClimbRate
fields.description: Max climb rate in manual modes with GPS aiding (uses fw.max_manual_climb_rate or mc.max_manual_climb_rate).

fields.name: mcMaxBankAngle
fields.description: Max bank angle for multirotor position hold (navConfig()->mc.max_bank_angle).

name: MSP_SET_NAV_POSHOLD
description: Sets navigation position hold and general manual/auto flight parameters.

fields.name: maxAutoClimbRate
fields.description: Sets fw.max_auto_climb_rate or mc.max_auto_climb_rate based on current platform type.

name: MSP_CALIBRATION_DATA
description: Retrieves sensor calibration data (Accelerometer zero/gain, Magnetometer zero/gain, Optical Flow scale).

fields.name: accCalibAxisFlags
fields.description: Flags indicating which axes of the accelerometer have been calibrated (accGetCalibrationAxisFlags()).

fields.name: magZeroX
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for X-axis (compassConfig()->magZero.raw[X]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magZeroY
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for Y-axis (compassConfig()->magZero.raw[Y]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magZeroZ
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for Z-axis (compassConfig()->magZero.raw[Z]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: opflowScale
fields.description: Optical flow scale factor (opticalFlowConfig()->opflow_scale 256). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

fields.name: magGainX
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for X-axis (compassConfig()->magGain[X]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magGainY
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for Y-axis (compassConfig()->magGain[Y]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magGainZ
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for Z-axis (compassConfig()->magGain[Z]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

name: MSP_SET_CALIBRATION_DATA
description: Sets sensor calibration data.

name: MSP_POSITION_ESTIMATION_CONFIG
description: Retrieves parameters related to the INAV position estimation fusion weights and GPS minimum satellite count.

fields.name: minSats
fields.description: Minimum satellites required for GPS use (gpsConfigMutable()->gpsMinSats).

fields.name: useGPSVelNED
fields.description: Legacy flag, always 1 (GPS velocity is always used if available).

name: MSP_SET_POSITION_ESTIMATION_CONFIG
description: Sets parameters related to the INAV position estimation fusion weights and GPS minimum satellite count.

name: MSP_WP_MISSION_LOAD
description: Commands the FC to load the waypoint mission stored in non-volatile memory (e.g., EEPROM or FlashFS) into the active mission buffer.

fields.name: missionID
fields.description: Reserved for future use, currently ignored.

name: MSP_WP_MISSION_SAVE
description: Commands the FC to save the currently active waypoint mission from RAM to non-volatile memory (e.g., EEPROM or FlashFS).

fields.name: missionID
fields.description: Reserved for future use, currently ignored.

name: MSP_WP_GETINFO
description: Retrieves information about the waypoint mission capabilities and the status of the currently loaded mission.

fields.name: wpCapabilities
fields.description: Reserved for future waypoint capabilities flags. Currently always 0.

fields.name: missionValid
fields.description: Boolean flag indicating if the current mission in RAM is valid (isWaypointListValid()).

fields.name: waypointCount
fields.description: Number of waypoints currently defined in the mission (getWaypointCount()).

name: MSP_RTH_AND_LAND_CONFIG
description: Retrieves configuration parameters related to Return-to-Home (RTH) and automatic landing behaviors.

fields.name: minRthDistance
fields.description: Minimum distance from home required for RTH to engage (navConfig()->general.min_rth_distance).

fields.name: rthClimbFirst
fields.description: Flag: Climb to RTH altitude before returning (navConfig()->general.flags.rth_climb_first).

fields.name: rthClimbIgnoreEmerg
fields.description: Flag: Climb even in emergency RTH (navConfig()->general.flags.rth_climb_ignore_emerg).

fields.name: rthAllowLanding
fields.description: Flag: Allow automatic landing after RTH (navConfig()->general.flags.rth_allow_landing).

fields.name: rthAbortThreshold
fields.description: Stick input threshold to abort RTH (navConfig()->general.rth_abort_threshold).

fields.name: landMinAltVspd
fields.description: Landing vertical speed at minimum slowdown altitude (navConfig()->general.land_minalt_vspd).

fields.name: landMaxAltVspd
fields.description: Landing vertical speed at maximum slowdown altitude (navConfig()->general.land_maxalt_vspd).

fields.name: emergDescentRate
fields.description: Vertical speed during emergency landing descent (navConfig()->general.emerg_descent_rate).

name: MSP_SET_RTH_AND_LAND_CONFIG
description: Sets configuration parameters related to Return-to-Home (RTH) and automatic landing behaviors.

name: MSP_FW_CONFIG
description: Retrieves configuration parameters specific to Fixed Wing navigation.

fields.name: maxDiveAngle
fields.description: Maximum negative pitch angle during descent (navConfig()->fw.max_dive_angle).

name: MSP_SET_FW_CONFIG
description: Sets configuration parameters specific to Fixed Wing navigation.

name: MSP_MODE_RANGES
description: Returns all defined mode activation ranges (aux channel assignments for flight modes).

fields.name: modePermanentId
fields.description: Permanent ID of the flight mode (maps to boxId via findBoxByActiveBoxId). 0 if entry unused.

fields.name: auxChannelIndex
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel used for activation.

fields.name: rangeStartStep
fields.description: Start step (corresponding to channel value range 900-2100 in steps of 50/25, depends on steps calculation).

fields.name: rangeEndStep
fields.description: End step for the activation range.

name: MSP_SET_MODE_RANGE
description: Sets a single mode activation range by its index.

fields.name: rangeIndex
fields.description: Index of the mode range to set (0 to MAX_MODE_ACTIVATION_CONDITION_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: modePermanentId
fields.description: Permanent ID of the flight mode to assign.

name: MSP_FEATURE
description: Returns a bitmask of enabled features.

name: MSP_SET_FEATURE
description: Sets the enabled features using a bitmask. Clears all previous features first.

name: MSP_BOARD_ALIGNMENT
description: Returns the sensor board alignment angles relative to the craft frame.

name: MSP_SET_BOARD_ALIGNMENT
description: Sets the sensor board alignment angles.

name: MSP_CURRENT_METER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for the current sensor.

fields.name: scale
fields.description: Current sensor scale factor (batteryMetersConfig()->current.scale). Units depend on sensor type.

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Battery capacity (constrained 0-65535) (currentBatteryProfile->capacity.value). Note: This is legacy, use MSP2_INAV_BATTERY_CONFIG for full 32-bit capacity.

name: MSP_SET_CURRENT_METER_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for the current sensor.

name: MSP_MIXER
description: Retrieves the mixer type (Legacy, INAV always returns QuadX).

name: MSP_SET_MIXER
description: Sets the mixer type (Legacy, ignored by INAV).

fields.name: mixerMode
fields.description: Mixer mode to set (ignored by INAV).

name: MSP_RX_CONFIG
description: Retrieves receiver configuration settings. Some fields are Betaflight compatibility placeholders.

fields.name: maxCheck
fields.description: Upper channel value threshold for stick commands (rxConfig()->maxcheck).

fields.name: minCheck
fields.description: Lower channel value threshold for stick commands (rxConfig()->mincheck).

fields.name: spektrumSatBind
fields.description: Spektrum bind pulses (rxConfig()->spektrum_sat_bind). 0 if USE_SPEKTRUM_BIND disabled.

name: MSP_SET_RX_CONFIG
description: Sets receiver configuration settings.

name: MSP_LED_COLORS
description: Retrieves the HSV color definitions for configurable LED colors.

name: MSP_SET_LED_COLORS
description: Sets the HSV color definitions for configurable LED colors.

name: MSP_LED_STRIP_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for each LED on the strip (legacy packed format).

fields.name: legacyLedConfig
fields.description: Packed LED configuration (position, function, overlay, color, direction, params). See C code for bit packing details.

name: MSP_SET_LED_STRIP_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for a single LED on the strip using the legacy packed format.

fields.name: ledIndex
fields.description: Index of the LED to configure (0 to LED_MAX_STRIP_LENGTH - 1).

name: MSP_RSSI_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the channel used for analog RSSI input.

fields.name: rssiChannel
fields.description: AUX channel index (1-based) used for RSSI, or 0 if disabled (rxConfig()->rssi_channel).

name: MSP_SET_RSSI_CONFIG
description: Sets the channel used for analog RSSI input.

fields.name: rssiChannel
fields.description: AUX channel index (1-based) to use for RSSI, or 0 to disable.

name: MSP_ADJUSTMENT_RANGES
description: Returns all defined RC adjustment ranges (tuning via aux channels).

fields.name: adjustmentIndex
fields.description: Index of the adjustment slot (0 to MAX_SIMULTANEOUS_ADJUSTMENT_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: auxChannelIndex
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel controlling the adjustment value.

fields.name: rangeStartStep
fields.description: Start step (0-20) of the control channel range.

fields.name: rangeEndStep
fields.description: End step (0-20) of the control channel range.

fields.name: adjustmentFunction
fields.description: Function/parameter being adjusted (e.g., PID gain, rate). See rcAdjustments.h enum.

fields.name: auxSwitchChannelIndex
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel acting as an enable switch (or 0 if always enabled).

name: MSP_SET_ADJUSTMENT_RANGE
description: Sets a single RC adjustment range configuration by its index.

fields.name: rangeIndex
fields.description: Index of the adjustment range to set (0 to MAX_ADJUSTMENT_RANGE_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: auxChannelIndex
fields.description: 0-based index of the control AUX channel.

fields.name: auxSwitchChannelIndex
fields.description: 0-based index of the enable switch AUX channel (or 0).

name: MSP_CF_SERIAL_CONFIG
description: Deprecated command to get serial port configuration.

name: MSP_SET_CF_SERIAL_CONFIG
description: Deprecated command to set serial port configuration.

name: MSP_VOLTAGE_METER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves legacy voltage meter configuration (scaled values).

fields.name: vbatScale
fields.description: Voltage sensor scale factor / 10 (batteryMetersConfig()->voltage.scale / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatMinCell
fields.description: Minimum cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMin / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatMaxCell
fields.description: Maximum cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMax / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatWarningCell
fields.description: Warning cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellWarning / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

name: MSP_SET_VOLTAGE_METER_CONFIG
description: Sets legacy voltage meter configuration (scaled values).

name: MSP_SONAR_ALTITUDE
description: Retrieves the altitude measured by the primary rangefinder (sonar or lidar).

fields.name: rangefinderAltitude
fields.description: Latest altitude reading from the rangefinder (rangefinderGetLatestAltitude()). 0 if USE_RANGEFINDER disabled or no reading.

name: MSP_RX_MAP
description: Retrieves the RC channel mapping array (AETR, etc.).

fields.name: rcMap
fields.description: Array defining the mapping from input channel index to logical function (Roll, Pitch, Yaw, Throttle, Aux1...).

name: MSP_SET_RX_MAP
description: Sets the RC channel mapping array.

fields.name: rcMap
fields.description: Array defining the new channel mapping.

name: MSP_REBOOT
description: Commands the flight controller to reboot.

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_SUMMARY
description: Retrieves summary information about the onboard dataflash chip (if present and used for Blackbox via FlashFS).

fields.name: flashReady
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if flash chip is ready, 0 otherwise. (flashIsReady()). 0 if USE_FLASHFS disabled.

fields.name: sectorCount
fields.description: Total number of sectors on the flash chip (geometry->sectors). 0 if USE_FLASHFS disabled.

fields.name: totalSize
fields.description: Total size of the flash chip in bytes (geometry->totalSize). 0 if USE_FLASHFS disabled.

fields.name: usedSize
fields.description: Currently used size in bytes (FlashFS offset) (flashfsGetOffset()). 0 if USE_FLASHFS disabled.

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_READ
description: Reads a block of data from the onboard dataflash (FlashFS).

fields.name: address
fields.description: Starting address to read from within the FlashFS volume.

fields.name: size
fields.description: (Optional) Number of bytes to read. Defaults to 128 if not provided.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The starting address from which data was actually read.

fields.name: data
fields.description: The data read from flash. Length is MIN(requested size, remaining buffer space, remaining flashfs data).

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_ERASE
description: Erases the entire onboard dataflash chip (FlashFS volume).

name: MSP_LOOP_TIME
description: Retrieves the configured loop time (PID loop frequency denominator).

name: MSP_SET_LOOP_TIME
description: Sets the configured loop time.

name: MSP_FAILSAFE_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the failsafe configuration settings.

fields.name: failsafeOffDelay
fields.description: Delay after signal recovery before returning control (failsafeConfig()->failsafe_off_delay).

fields.name: failsafeRecoveryDelay
fields.description: Delay after RTH finishes before attempting recovery (failsafeConfig()->failsafe_recovery_delay).

fields.name: failsafeStickThreshold
fields.description: Stick movement threshold to exit failsafe (failsafeConfig()->failsafe_stick_motion_threshold).

fields.name: failsafeMinDistance
fields.description: Minimum distance from home for RTH failsafe (failsafeConfig()->failsafe_min_distance).

fields.name: failsafeMinDistanceProc
fields.description: Failsafe procedure if below min distance (failsafeConfig()->failsafe_min_distance_procedure).

name: MSP_SET_FAILSAFE_CONFIG
description: Sets the failsafe configuration settings.

name: MSP_SDCARD_SUMMARY
description: Retrieves summary information about the SD card status and filesystem.

fields.name: sdCardSupported
fields.description: Bitmask: Bit 0 = 1 if SD card support compiled in (USE_SDCARD).

fields.name: sdCardState
fields.description: Enum (mspSDCardState_e): Current state (Not Present, Fatal, Card Init, FS Init, Ready). 0 if USE_SDCARD disabled.

fields.name: fsError
fields.description: Last filesystem error code (afatfs_getLastError()). 0 if USE_SDCARD disabled.

fields.name: freeSpaceKB
fields.description: Free space in KiB (afatfs_getContiguousFreeSpace() / 1024). 0 if USE_SDCARD disabled.

fields.name: totalSpaceKB
fields.description: Total space in KiB (sdcard_getMetadata()->numBlocks / 2). 0 if USE_SDCARD disabled.

name: MSP_BLACKBOX_CONFIG
description: Legacy command to retrieve Blackbox configuration. Superseded by MSP2_BLACKBOX_CONFIG.

name: MSP_SET_BLACKBOX_CONFIG
description: Legacy command to set Blackbox configuration. Superseded by MSP2_SET_BLACKBOX_CONFIG.

name: MSP_TRANSPONDER_CONFIG
description: Get VTX Transponder settings (likely specific to RaceFlight/Betaflight, not standard INAV VTX).

name: MSP_SET_TRANSPONDER_CONFIG
description: Set VTX Transponder settings.

name: MSP_OSD_CONFIG
description: Retrieves OSD configuration settings and layout for screen 0.

fields.name: videoSystem
fields.description: Video system (Auto/PAL/NTSC) (osdConfig()->video_system). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: units
fields.description: Measurement units (Metric/Imperial) (osdConfig()->units). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: rssiAlarm
fields.description: RSSI alarm threshold (osdConfig()->rssi_alarm). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: capAlarm
fields.description: Capacity alarm threshold (currentBatteryProfile->capacity.warning). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: timerAlarm
fields.description: Timer alarm threshold (osdConfig()->time_alarm). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: altAlarm
fields.description: Altitude alarm threshold (osdConfig()->alt_alarm). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: distAlarm
fields.description: Distance alarm threshold (osdConfig()->dist_alarm). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: negAltAlarm
fields.description: Negative altitude alarm threshold (osdConfig()->neg_alt_alarm). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: itemPositions
fields.description: Packed X/Y position for each OSD item on screen 0 (osdLayoutsConfig()->item_pos[0][i]). Sent even if OSD disabled.

name: MSP_SET_OSD_CONFIG
description: Sets OSD configuration or a single item's position on screen 0.

fields.name: itemIndex
fields.description: Index of the OSD item to position (0 to OSD_ITEM_COUNT - 1).

name: MSP_OSD_CHAR_READ
description: Reads character data from the OSD font memory.

name: MSP_OSD_CHAR_WRITE
description: Writes character data to the OSD font memory.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Starting address in font memory. Size depends on total payload size.

fields.name: charData
fields.description: Character bitmap data (54 or 64 bytes per char, depending on format).

name: MSP_VTX_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the current VTX (Video Transmitter) configuration and capabilities.

fields.name: vtxDeviceType
fields.description: Enum (VTXDEV_): Type of VTX device detected/configured. VTXDEV_UNKNOWN if none.

fields.name: pitMode
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX is currently in pit mode, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: vtxReady
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX device reported ready, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: lowPowerDisarm
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if low power on disarm is enabled (from vtxSettingsConfig).

fields.name: vtxTableAvailable
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX tables (band/power) are available for query.

fields.name: bandCount
fields.description: Number of bands supported by the VTX device.

fields.name: channelCount
fields.description: Number of channels per band supported by the VTX device.

fields.name: powerCount
fields.description: Number of power levels supported by the VTX device.

name: MSP_SET_VTX_CONFIG
description: Sets the VTX configuration (band, channel, power, pit mode). Supports multiple protocol versions/extensions based on payload size.

fields.name: pitMode
fields.description: Pit mode state to set (0=off, 1=on). Directly calls vtxCommonSetPitMode.

fields.name: band
fields.description: Explicit band number to set (vtxSettingsConfigMutable()->band). Overrides encoded value if present.

fields.name: channel
fields.description: Explicit channel number to set (vtxSettingsConfigMutable()->channel). Overrides encoded value if present.

fields.name: powerCount
fields.description: Ignored. Betaflight extension (can potentially reduce reported power count if valid).

name: MSP_ADVANCED_CONFIG
description: Retrieves advanced hardware-related configuration (PWM protocols, rates). Some fields are BF compatibility placeholders.

fields.name: useUnsyncedPwm
fields.description: Always 1 (BF compatibility, INAV uses async PWM based on protocol).

name: MSP_SET_ADVANCED_CONFIG
description: Sets advanced hardware-related configuration (PWM protocols, rates).

name: MSP_FILTER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves filter configuration settings (Gyro, D-term, Yaw, Accel). Some fields are BF compatibility placeholders or legacy.

fields.name: gyroMainLpfHz
fields.description: Gyro main low-pass filter cutoff frequency (gyroConfig()->gyro_main_lpf_hz).

name: MSP_SET_FILTER_CONFIG
description: Sets filter configuration settings. Handles different payload lengths for backward compatibility.

name: MSP_PID_ADVANCED
description: Retrieves advanced PID tuning parameters. Many fields are BF compatibility placeholders.

name: MSP_SET_PID_ADVANCED
description: Sets advanced PID tuning parameters.

name: MSP_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configured hardware type for various sensors.

fields.name: baroHardware
fields.description: Enum (baroHardware_e): Barometer hardware type (barometerConfig()->baro_hardware). 0 if USE_BARO disabled.

fields.name: magHardware
fields.description: Enum (magHardware_e): Magnetometer hardware type (compassConfig()->mag_hardware). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: pitotHardware
fields.description: Enum (pitotHardware_e): Pitot tube hardware type (pitotmeterConfig()->pitot_hardware). 0 if USE_PITOT disabled.

fields.name: rangefinderHardware
fields.description: Enum (rangefinderHardware_e): Rangefinder hardware type (rangefinderConfig()->rangefinder_hardware). 0 if USE_RANGEFINDER disabled.

fields.name: opflowHardware
fields.description: Enum (opticalFlowHardware_e): Optical flow hardware type (opticalFlowConfig()->opflow_hardware). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

name: MSP_SET_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Sets the configured hardware type for various sensors.

name: MSP_SPECIAL_PARAMETERS
description: Betaflight specific, likely unused/unimplemented in INAV.

name: MSP_SET_SPECIAL_PARAMETERS
description: Betaflight specific, likely unused/unimplemented in INAV.

name: MSP_IDENT
description: Provides basic flight controller identity information. Not implemented in modern INAV, but used by legacy versions and MultiWii.

name: MSP_STATUS
description: Provides basic flight controller status including cycle time, errors, sensor status, active modes (first 32), and the current configuration profile.

fields.name: i2cErrors
fields.description: Number of I2C errors encountered (i2cGetErrorCounter()). 0 if USE_I2C not defined.

fields.name: sensorStatus
fields.description: Bitmask indicating available/active sensors (packSensorStatus()). See notes.

fields.name: activeModesLow
fields.description: First 32 bits of the active flight modes bitmask (packBoxModeFlags()).

name: MSP_RAW_IMU
description: Provides raw sensor readings from the IMU (Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer).

fields.name: magX
fields.description: Raw magnetometer X reading (mag.magADC[X]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magY
fields.description: Raw magnetometer Y reading (mag.magADC[Y]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

fields.name: magZ
fields.description: Raw magnetometer Z reading (mag.magADC[Z]). 0 if USE_MAG disabled.

name: MSP_SERVO
description: Provides the current output values for all supported servos.

fields.name: servoOutputs
fields.description: Array of current servo output values (typically 1000-2000).

name: MSP_MOTOR
description: Provides the current output values for the first 8 motors.

fields.name: motorOutputs
fields.description: Array of current motor output values (typically 1000-2000). Values beyond MAX_SUPPORTED_MOTORS are 0.

name: MSP_RC
description: Provides the current values of the received RC channels.

fields.name: rcChannels
fields.description: Array of current RC channel values (typically 1000-2000). Length depends on detected channels.

name: MSP_RAW_GPS
description: Provides raw GPS data (fix status, coordinates, altitude, speed, course).

fields.name: numSat
fields.description: Number of satellites used in solution (gpsSol.numSat).

name: MSP_COMP_GPS
description: Provides computed GPS values: distance and direction to home.

fields.name: gpsHeartbeat
fields.description: Indicates if GPS data is being received (gpsSol.flags.gpsHeartbeat).

name: MSP_ATTITUDE
description: Provides the current attitude estimate (roll, pitch, yaw).

name: MSP_ALTITUDE
description: Provides estimated altitude, vertical speed (variometer), and raw barometric altitude.

fields.name: baroAltitude
fields.description: Latest raw altitude from barometer (baroGetLatestAltitude()). 0 if USE_BARO disabled.

name: MSP_ANALOG
description: Provides analog sensor readings: battery voltage, current consumption (mAh), RSSI, and current draw (Amps).

fields.name: rssi
fields.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator (getRSSI()). Units depend on source.

name: MSP_RC_TUNING
description: Retrieves RC tuning parameters (rates, expos, TPA) for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP_ACTIVEBOXES
description: Provides the full bitmask of currently active flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: activeModes
fields.description: Bitmask of all active modes (packBoxModeFlags()). Size depends on boxBitmask_t definition.

name: MSP_MISC
description: Retrieves miscellaneous configuration settings, mostly related to RC, GPS, Mag, and Battery voltage (legacy formats).

fields.name: gpsType
fields.description: GPS provider type (gpsConfig()->provider). 0 if USE_GPS disabled.

fields.name: gpsSbasMode
fields.description: GPS SBAS mode (gpsConfig()->sbasMode). 0 if USE_GPS disabled.

fields.name: vbatMinCell
fields.description: Min cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMin / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatMaxCell
fields.description: Max cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMax / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatWarningCell
fields.description: Warning cell voltage / 10 (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellWarning / 10). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

name: MSP_BOXNAMES
description: Provides a semicolon-separated string containing the names of all available flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: boxNamesString
fields.description: String containing mode names separated by ';'. Null termination not guaranteed by MSP, relies on payload size. (serializeBoxNamesReply()).

name: MSP_PIDNAMES
description: Provides a semicolon-separated string containing the names of the PID controllers.

fields.name: pidNamesString
fields.description: String "ROLL;PITCH;YAW;ALT;Pos;PosR;NavR;LEVEL;MAG;VEL;". Null termination not guaranteed by MSP.

name: MSP_WP
description: Get/Set a single waypoint from the mission plan.

fields.name: waypointIndex
fields.description: Index of the waypoint to retrieve (0 to NAV_MAX_WAYPOINTS - 1).

fields.name: altitude
fields.description: Altitude coordinate (relative to home or sea level, see flag).

name: MSP_BOXIDS
description: Provides a list of permanent IDs associated with the available flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: boxIds
fields.description: Array of permanent IDs for each configured box (serializeBoxReply()). Length depends on number of boxes.

name: MSP_SERVO_CONFIGURATIONS
description: Retrieves the configuration parameters for all supported servos (min, max, middle, rate). Legacy format with unused fields.

name: MSP_NAV_STATUS
description: Retrieves the current status of the navigation system.

fields.name: navMode
fields.description: Enum (NAV_MODE_): Current navigation mode (None, RTH, WP, Hold, etc.) (NAV_Status.mode).

fields.name: activeWpAction
fields.description: Enum (navWaypointActions_e): Action of the currently executing waypoint (NAV_Status.activeWpAction).

fields.name: activeWpNumber
fields.description: Index: Index of the currently executing waypoint (NAV_Status.activeWpNumber).

fields.name: targetHeading
fields.description: degrees: Target heading for heading controller (getHeadingHoldTarget()).

name: MSP_3D
description: Retrieves settings related to 3D/reversible motor operation.

name: MSP_RC_DEADBAND
description: Retrieves RC input deadband settings.

name: MSP_SENSOR_ALIGNMENT
description: Retrieves sensor alignment settings (legacy format).

fields.name: opflowAlign
fields.description: Optical flow alignment (opticalFlowConfig()->opflow_align). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

name: MSP_LED_STRIP_MODECOLOR
description: Retrieves the color index assigned to each LED mode and function/direction combination, including special colors.

fields.name: modeIndex
fields.description: Index of the LED mode (ledModeIndex_e). LED_MODE_COUNT for special colors.

fields.name: directionOrSpecialIndex
fields.description: Index of the direction (ledDirection_e) or special color (ledSpecialColor_e).

fields.name: colorIndex
fields.description: Index of the color assigned from ledStripConfig()->colors.

name: MSP_BATTERY_STATE
description: Provides battery state information, formatted primarily for DJI FPV Goggles compatibility.

name: MSP_VTXTABLE_BAND
description: Retrieves information about a specific VTX band from the VTX table. (Implementation missing in provided fc_msp.c)

name: MSP_VTXTABLE_POWERLEVEL
description: Retrieves information about a specific VTX power level from the VTX table.

fields.name: powerLevelIndex
fields.description: 1-based index of the power level to query.

fields.name: powerLevelIndex
fields.description: 1-based index of the returned power level.

fields.name: powerValue
fields.description: Always 0 (Actual power value in mW is not stored/returned via MSP).

fields.name: labelLength
fields.description: Length of the power level label string that follows.

fields.name: label
fields.description: Power level label string (e.g., "25", "200"). Length given by previous field.

name: MSP_STATUS_EX
description: Provides extended flight controller status, including CPU load, arming flags, and calibration status, in addition to MSP_STATUS fields.

fields.name: armingFlags
fields.description: Flight controller arming flags (armingFlags). Note: Truncated to 16 bits.

name: MSP_SENSOR_STATUS
description: Provides the hardware status for each individual sensor system.

fields.name: overallHealth
fields.description: 1 if all essential hardware is healthy, 0 otherwise (isHardwareHealthy()).

name: MSP_UID
description: Provides the unique identifier of the microcontroller.

fields.name: uid0
fields.description: First 32 bits of the unique ID (U_ID_0).

fields.name: uid1
fields.description: Middle 32 bits of the unique ID (U_ID_1).

fields.name: uid2
fields.description: Last 32 bits of the unique ID (U_ID_2).

name: MSP_GPSSVINFO
description: Provides satellite signal strength information (legacy U-Blox compatibility stub).

fields.name: numChannels
fields.description: Always 0 (Number of SV info channels reported).

name: MSP_GPSSTATISTICS
description: Provides debugging statistics for the GPS communication link.

fields.name: lastMessageDt
fields.description: Time since last valid GPS message (gpsStats.lastMessageDt).

fields.name: packetCount
fields.description: Number of valid GPS packets received (gpsStats.packetCount).

name: MSP_SET_TX_INFO
description: Allows a transmitter LUA script (or similar) to send runtime information (currently only RSSI) to the firmware.

fields.name: rssi
fields.description: RSSI value (0-100) provided by the external source.

name: MSP_TX_INFO
description: Provides information potentially useful for transmitter LUA scripts.

fields.name: rssiSource
fields.description: Enum: Source of the RSSI value (getRSSISource()).

fields.name: rtcDateTimeIsSet
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if the RTC has been set, 0 otherwise.

name: MSP_SET_RAW_RC
description: Provides raw RC channel data to the flight controller, typically used when the receiver is connected via MSP (e.g., MSP RX feature).

fields.name: rcChannels
fields.description: Array of RC channel values (typically 1000-2000). Number of channels determined by payload size.

name: MSP_SET_RAW_GPS
description: Provides raw GPS data to the flight controller, typically for simulation or external GPS injection.

fields.name: groundCourse
fields.description: Ground course (units unclear from code, likely degrees or deci-degrees, ignored in current code).

name: MSP_SET_BOX
description: Sets the state of flight modes (boxes). (Likely unused/obsolete in INAV).

name: MSP_SET_RC_TUNING
description: Sets RC tuning parameters (rates, expos, TPA) for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP_ACC_CALIBRATION
description: Starts the accelerometer calibration procedure.

name: MSP_MAG_CALIBRATION
description: Starts the magnetometer calibration procedure.

name: MSP_SET_MISC
description: Sets miscellaneous configuration settings (legacy formats/scaling).

name: MSP_RESET_CONF
description: Resets all configuration settings to their default values and saves to EEPROM.

name: MSP_SET_WP
description: Sets a single waypoint in the mission plan.

fields.name: waypointIndex
fields.description: Index of the waypoint to set (0 to NAV_MAX_WAYPOINTS - 1).

name: MSP_SELECT_SETTING
description: Selects the active configuration profile and saves it.

fields.name: profileIndex
fields.description: Index of the profile to activate (0-based).

name: MSP_SET_HEAD
description: Sets the target heading for the heading hold controller (e.g., during MAG mode).

name: MSP_SET_SERVO_CONFIGURATION
description: Sets the configuration for a single servo (legacy format).

fields.name: servoIndex
fields.description: Index of the servo to configure (0 to MAX_SUPPORTED_SERVOS - 1).

name: MSP_SET_MOTOR
description: Sets the disarmed motor values, typically used for motor testing or propeller balancing functions in a configurator.

fields.name: motorValues
fields.description: Array of motor values to set when disarmed. Only affects first MAX_SUPPORTED_MOTORS.

name: MSP_SET_3D
description: Sets parameters related to 3D/reversible motor operation.

name: MSP_SET_RC_DEADBAND
description: Sets RC input deadband values.

name: MSP_SET_RESET_CURR_PID
description: Resets the PIDs of the current profile to their default values. Does not save.

name: MSP_SET_SENSOR_ALIGNMENT
description: Sets sensor alignment (legacy format).

name: MSP_SET_LED_STRIP_MODECOLOR
description: Sets the color index for a specific LED mode/function combination.

fields.name: modeIndex
fields.description: Index of the LED mode (ledModeIndex_e or LED_MODE_COUNT for special).

fields.name: directionOrSpecialIndex
fields.description: Index of the direction or special color.

fields.name: colorIndex
fields.description: Index of the color to assign from ledStripConfig()->colors.

name: MSP_SET_ACC_TRIM
description: Sets the accelerometer trim values (leveling calibration).

name: MSP_ACC_TRIM
description: Gets the accelerometer trim values.

name: MSP_SERVO_MIX_RULES
description: Retrieves the custom servo mixer rules (legacy format).

fields.name: inputSource
fields.description: Input source for the mix (RC chan, Roll, Pitch...). See mixerSource_t.

name: MSP_SET_SERVO_MIX_RULE
description: Sets a single custom servo mixer rule (legacy format).

fields.name: ruleIndex
fields.description: Index of the rule to set (0 to MAX_SERVO_RULES - 1).

name: MSP_SET_PASSTHROUGH
direction: In/Out (Special: In command triggers passthrough mode, Reply confirms start)
description: Enables serial passthrough mode to peripherals like ESCs (BLHeli 4-way) or other serial devices.

fields.name: passthroughMode
fields.description: Type of passthrough (mspPassthroughType_e: Serial ID, Serial Function, ESC 4way).

fields.name: passthroughArgument
fields.description: Argument for the mode (e.g., Serial Port Identifier, Serial Function ID). Defaults to 0 if not sent.

fields.name: status
fields.description: 1 if passthrough started successfully, 0 on error (e.g., port not found). For 4way, returns number of ESCs found.

name: MSP_RTC
description: Retrieves the current Real-Time Clock time.

fields.name: seconds
fields.description: Seconds since epoch (or relative time if not set). 0 if RTC time unknown.

fields.name: millis
fields.description: Millisecond part of the time. 0 if RTC time unknown.

name: MSP_SET_RTC
description: Sets the Real-Time Clock time.

fields.name: seconds
fields.description: Seconds component of time to set.

fields.name: millis
fields.description: Millisecond component of time to set.

name: MSP_EEPROM_WRITE
description: Saves the current configuration from RAM to non-volatile memory (EEPROM/Flash).

name: MSP_DEBUGMSG
description: Retrieves debug ("serial printf") messages from the firmware.

name: MSP_DEBUG
description: Retrieves values from the firmware's debug[] array (legacy 16-bit version).

fields.name: debugValues
fields.description: First 4 values from the debug array.

name: MSP_V2_FRAME
description: This ID is used as a payload indicator within an MSPv1 message structure ($M>) to signify that the following payload conforms to the MSPv2 format. It's not a command itself.

name: MSP2_COMMON_TZ
description: Gets the time zone offset configuration.

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_TZ
description: Sets the time zone offset configuration.

name: MSP2_COMMON_SETTING
description: Gets the value of a specific configuration setting, identified by name or index.

fields.name: settingName
fields.description: Null-terminated string containing the setting name (e.g., "gyro_main_lpf_hz").

fields.name: settingValue
fields.description: Raw byte value of the setting. Size depends on the setting's type (settingGetValueSize()).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_SETTING
description: Sets the value of a specific configuration setting, identified by name or index.

fields.name: settingIdentifier
fields.description: Setting name (null-terminated string) OR Index (0x00 followed by uint16_t index).

fields.name: settingValue
fields.description: Raw byte value to set for the setting. Size must match the setting's type.

name: MSP2_COMMON_MOTOR_MIXER
description: Retrieves the current motor mixer configuration (throttle, roll, pitch, yaw weights for each motor) for the primary and secondary mixer profiles.

fields.name: throttleWeight
fields.description: Throttle weight 1000, offset by 2000. (Range -2.0 to +2.0 -> 0 to 4000).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_MOTOR_MIXER
description: Sets the motor mixer weights for a single motor in the primary mixer profile.

fields.name: motorIndex
fields.description: Index of the motor to configure (0 to MAX_SUPPORTED_MOTORS - 1).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SETTING_INFO
description: Gets detailed information about a specific configuration setting (name, type, range, flags, current value, etc.).

fields.name: profileCount
fields.description: Total number of profiles (if applicable, else 0).

fields.name: lookupNames
fields.description: (If mode == MODE_LOOKUP) Series of null-terminated strings for each possible value from min to max.

fields.name: settingValue
fields.description: Current raw byte value of the setting.

name: MSP2_COMMON_PG_LIST
description: Gets a list of Parameter Group Numbers (PGNs) used by settings, along with the start and end setting indexes for each group. Can request info for a single PGN.

fields.name: pgn
fields.description: PGN ID to query. If omitted, returns all used PGNs.

fields.name: startIndex
fields.description: Absolute index of the first setting in this group.

fields.name: endIndex
fields.description: Absolute index of the last setting in this group.

name: MSP2_COMMON_SERIAL_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for all available serial ports.

fields.name: mspBaudIndex
fields.description: Baud rate index for MSP function.

fields.name: gpsBaudIndex
fields.description: Baud rate index for GPS function.

fields.name: telemetryBaudIndex
fields.description: Baud rate index for Telemetry function.

fields.name: peripheralBaudIndex
fields.description: Baud rate index for other peripheral functions.

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_SERIAL_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for one or more serial ports.

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_RADAR_POS
description: Sets the position and status information for a "radar" Point of Interest (POI). Used for displaying other craft/objects on the OSD map.

fields.name: poiIndex
fields.description: Index of the POI slot (0 to RADAR_MAX_POIS - 1).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_RADAR_ITD
description: Sets radar information to display (likely internal/unused).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_MSP_RC_LINK_STATS
description: Provides RC link statistics (RSSI, LQ) to the FC, typically from an MSP-based RC link (like ExpressLRS). Sent periodically by the RC link.

fields.name: validLink
fields.description: Indicates if the link is currently valid (not in failsafe).

fields.name: uplinkRSSI_dBm
fields.description: Uplink RSSI in dBm (sent as positive, e.g., 70 means -70dBm).

name: MSP2_COMMON_SET_MSP_RC_INFO
description: Provides additional RC link information (power levels, band, mode) to the FC from an MSP-based RC link. Sent less frequently than link stats.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_RANGEFINDER
description: Provides rangefinder data (distance, quality) from an external MSP-based sensor.

fields.name: distanceMm
fields.description: Measured distance. Negative value indicates out of range.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_OPTIC_FLOW
description: Provides optical flow data (motion, quality) from an external MSP-based sensor.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_GPS
description: Provides detailed GPS data from an external MSP-based GPS module.

fields.name: satellitesInView
fields.description: Number of satellites used in solution.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_COMPASS
description: Provides magnetometer data from an external MSP-based compass module.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_BAROMETER
description: Provides barometer data from an external MSP-based barometer module.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_AIRSPEED
description: Provides airspeed data from an external MSP-based pitot sensor module.

name: MSP2_SENSOR_HEADTRACKER
description: Provides head tracker orientation data.

name: MSP2_INAV_STATUS
description: Provides comprehensive flight controller status, extending MSP_STATUS_EX with full arming flags, battery profile, and mixer profile.

fields.name: profileAndBattProfile
fields.description: Bits 0-3: Config profile index (getConfigProfile()), Bits 4-7: Battery profile index (getConfigBatteryProfile()).

fields.name: activeModes
fields.description: Full bitmask of active flight modes (packBoxModeFlags()).

name: MSP2_INAV_OPTICAL_FLOW
description: Provides data from the optical flow sensor.

fields.name: quality
fields.description: Raw quality indicator from the sensor (opflow.rawQuality). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

fields.name: flowRateX
fields.description: Optical flow rate X (roll axis) (RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(opflow.flowRate[X])). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

fields.name: flowRateY
fields.description: Optical flow rate Y (pitch axis) (RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(opflow.flowRate[Y])). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

fields.name: bodyRateX
fields.description: Compensated body rate X (roll axis) (RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(opflow.bodyRate[X])). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

fields.name: bodyRateY
fields.description: Compensated body rate Y (pitch axis) (RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(opflow.bodyRate[Y])). 0 if USE_OPFLOW disabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_ANALOG
description: Provides detailed analog sensor readings, superseding MSP_ANALOG with higher precision and additional fields.

fields.name: batteryFlags
fields.description: Battery status flags: Bit 0=Full on plug-in, Bit 1=Use capacity threshold, Bit 2-3=Battery State enum (getBatteryState()), Bit 4-7=Cell Count (getBatteryCellCount()).

name: MSP2_INAV_MISC
description: Retrieves miscellaneous configuration settings, superseding MSP_MISC with higher precision and capacity fields.

fields.name: gpsType
fields.description: GPS provider type (gpsConfig()->provider). 0 if USE_GPS disabled.

fields.name: gpsSbasMode
fields.description: GPS SBAS mode (gpsConfig()->sbasMode). 0 if USE_GPS disabled.

fields.name: cellCount
fields.description: Configured cell count (currentBatteryProfile->cells). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatCellDetect
fields.description: Cell detection voltage (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellDetect). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatMinCell
fields.description: Min cell voltage (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMin). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatMaxCell
fields.description: Max cell voltage (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellMax). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

fields.name: vbatWarningCell
fields.description: Warning cell voltage (currentBatteryProfile->voltage.cellWarning). 0 if USE_ADC disabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_MISC
description: Sets miscellaneous configuration settings, superseding MSP_SET_MISC.

fields.name: capacityUnit
fields.description: Sets batteryMetersConfigMutable()->capacity_unit (validated). Updates OSD energy unit if changed.

name: MSP2_INAV_BATTERY_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration specific to the battery voltage and current sensors and capacity settings for the current battery profile.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_BATTERY_CONFIG
description: Sets the battery voltage/current sensor configuration and capacity settings for the current battery profile.

fields.name: capacityUnit
fields.description: Sets batteryMetersConfigMutable()->capacity_unit (validated). Updates OSD energy unit if changed.

name: MSP2_INAV_RATE_PROFILE
description: Retrieves the rates and expos for the current control rate profile, including both stabilized and manual flight modes. Supersedes MSP_RC_TUNING.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_RATE_PROFILE
description: Sets the rates and expos for the current control rate profile (stabilized and manual). Supersedes MSP_SET_RC_TUNING.

name: MSP2_INAV_AIR_SPEED
description: Retrieves the estimated or measured airspeed.

fields.name: airspeed
fields.description: Estimated/measured airspeed (getAirspeedEstimate()). 0 if USE_PITOT disabled or no valid data.

name: MSP2_INAV_OUTPUT_MAPPING
description: Retrieves the output mapping configuration (identifies which timer outputs are used for Motors/Servos). Legacy version sending only 8-bit usage flags.

fields.name: usageFlags
fields.description: Timer usage flags (truncated). TIM_USE_MOTOR or TIM_USE_SERVO.

name: MSP2_INAV_MC_BRAKING
description: Retrieves configuration parameters for the multirotor braking mode feature.

fields.name: brakingBankAngle
fields.description: Maximum bank angle allowed during braking (navConfig()->mc.braking_bank_angle).

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_MC_BRAKING
description: Sets configuration parameters for the multirotor braking mode feature.

name: MSP2_INAV_OUTPUT_MAPPING_EXT
description: Retrieves extended output mapping configuration (timer ID and usage flags). Obsolete, use MSP2_INAV_OUTPUT_MAPPING_EXT2.

fields.name: timerId
fields.description: Hardware timer identifier (e.g., TIM1, TIM2). Value depends on target.

fields.name: usageFlags
fields.description: Timer usage flags (truncated). TIM_USE_MOTOR or TIM_USE_SERVO.

name: MSP2_INAV_TIMER_OUTPUT_MODE
description: Get or list the output mode override for hardware timers (e.g., force ONESHOT, DSHOT).

fields.name: timerIndex
fields.description: Index of the hardware timer definition (0 to HARDWARE_TIMER_DEFINITION_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: outputMode
fields.description: Output mode override for the requested timer.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_TIMER_OUTPUT_MODE
description: Set the output mode override for a specific hardware timer.

fields.name: timerIndex
fields.description: Index of the hardware timer definition.

fields.name: outputMode
fields.description: Output mode override (TIMER_OUTPUT_MODE_ enum) to set.

name: MSP2_INAV_MIXER
description: Retrieves INAV-specific mixer configuration details.

fields.name: motorDirectionInverted
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if motor direction is reversed globally (mixerConfig()->motorDirectionInverted).

fields.name: motorStopOnLow
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if motors stop at minimum throttle (mixerConfig()->motorstopOnLow).

fields.name: platformType
fields.description: Enum (platformType_e): Vehicle platform type (Multirotor, Airplane, etc.) (mixerConfig()->platformType).

fields.name: hasFlaps
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if the current mixer configuration includes flaps (mixerConfig()->hasFlaps).

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_MIXER
description: Sets INAV-specific mixer configuration details.

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_LAYOUTS
description: Gets OSD layout information (counts, positions for a specific layout, or position for a specific item).

fields.name: layoutIndex
fields.description: Index of the OSD layout (0 to OSD_LAYOUT_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: itemIndex
fields.description: Index of the OSD item (OSD_ITEM_ enum, 0 to OSD_ITEM_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: itemCount
fields.description: Number of OSD items per layout (OSD_ITEM_COUNT).

fields.name: itemPositions
fields.description: Packed X/Y positions for all items in the requested layout.

fields.name: itemPosition
fields.description: Packed X/Y position for the requested item in the requested layout.

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_SET_LAYOUT_ITEM
description: Sets the position of a single OSD item within a specific layout.

fields.name: layoutIndex
fields.description: Index of the OSD layout (0 to OSD_LAYOUT_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: itemIndex
fields.description: Index of the OSD item (OSD_ITEM_ enum).

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_ALARMS
description: Retrieves OSD alarm threshold settings.

fields.name: currentAlarm
fields.description: Current draw alarm threshold (osdConfig()->current_alarm). Units may need verification.

fields.name: baroTempMinAlarm
fields.description: Min Baro temperature alarm (osdConfig()->baro_temp_alarm_min). 0 if USE_BARO disabled.

fields.name: baroTempMaxAlarm
fields.description: Max Baro temperature alarm (osdConfig()->baro_temp_alarm_max). 0 if USE_BARO disabled.

fields.name: adsbWarnDistance
fields.description: ADSB warning distance (osdConfig()->adsb_distance_warning). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

fields.name: adsbAlertDistance
fields.description: ADSB alert distance (osdConfig()->adsb_distance_alert). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_SET_ALARMS
description: Sets OSD alarm threshold settings.

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_PREFERENCES
description: Retrieves OSD display preferences (video system, units, styles, etc.).

fields.name: mainVoltageDecimals
fields.description: Count: Decimal places for main voltage display (osdConfig()->main_voltage_decimals).

fields.name: ahiReverseRoll
fields.description: Boolean: Reverse roll direction on Artificial Horizon (osdConfig()->ahi_reverse_roll).

fields.name: crosshairsStyle
fields.description: Enum: Style of the center crosshairs (osdConfig()->crosshairs_style).

fields.name: leftSidebarScroll
fields.description: Boolean: Enable scrolling for left sidebar (osdConfig()->left_sidebar_scroll).

fields.name: rightSidebarScroll
fields.description: Boolean: Enable scrolling for right sidebar (osdConfig()->right_sidebar_scroll).

fields.name: sidebarScrollArrows
fields.description: Boolean: Show arrows for scrollable sidebars (osdConfig()->sidebar_scroll_arrows).

fields.name: statsEnergyUnit
fields.description: Enum: Unit for energy display in post-flight stats (osdConfig()->stats_energy_unit).

name: MSP2_INAV_OSD_SET_PREFERENCES
description: Sets OSD display preferences.

name: MSP2_INAV_SELECT_BATTERY_PROFILE
description: Selects the active battery profile and saves configuration.

fields.name: batteryProfileIndex
fields.description: Index of the battery profile to activate (0-based).

name: MSP2_INAV_DEBUG
description: Retrieves values from the firmware's 32-bit debug[] array. Supersedes MSP_DEBUG.

fields.name: debugValues
fields.description: Values from the debug array (typically 8 values).

name: MSP2_BLACKBOX_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the Blackbox configuration. Supersedes MSP_BLACKBOX_CONFIG.

fields.name: blackboxSupported
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if Blackbox is supported (USE_BLACKBOX), 0 otherwise.

fields.name: blackboxDevice
fields.description: Enum (blackboxDevice_e): Target device for logging (blackboxConfig()->device). 0 if not supported.

fields.name: blackboxRateNum
fields.description: Numerator for logging rate divider (blackboxConfig()->rate_num). 0 if not supported.

fields.name: blackboxRateDenom
fields.description: Denominator for logging rate divider (blackboxConfig()->rate_denom). 0 if not supported.

fields.name: blackboxIncludeFlags
fields.description: Bitmask: Flags for fields included/excluded from logging (blackboxConfig()->includeFlags).

name: MSP2_SET_BLACKBOX_CONFIG
description: Sets the Blackbox configuration. Supersedes MSP_SET_BLACKBOX_CONFIG.

name: MSP2_INAV_TEMP_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for all onboard temperature sensors.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Enum (tempSensorType_e): Type of the temperature sensor.

fields.name: osdSymbol
fields.description: Index: OSD symbol to use for this sensor (0 to TEMP_SENSOR_SYM_COUNT).

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_TEMP_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for all onboard temperature sensors.

name: MSP2_INAV_TEMPERATURES
description: Retrieves the current readings from all configured temperature sensors.

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: Current temperature reading. -1000 if sensor is invalid or reading failed.

name: MSP_SIMULATOR
description: Handles Hardware-in-the-Loop (HITL) simulation data exchange. Receives simulated sensor data and options, sends back control outputs and debug info.

fields.name: stabilizedThrottle
fields.description: Stabilized Throttle command output (-500 to 500 if armed, else -500).

fields.name: debugFlags
fields.description: Packed flags: Debug index (0-7), Platform type, Armed state, OSD feature status.

fields.name: osdRows
fields.description: (If OSD supported) Number of OSD rows.

fields.name: osdCols
fields.description: (If OSD supported) Number of OSD columns.

fields.name: osdStartY
fields.description: (If OSD supported) Starting row for RLE data.

fields.name: osdStartX
fields.description: (If OSD supported) Starting column for RLE data.

fields.name: osdRleData
fields.description: (If OSD supported) Run-length encoded OSD character data. Terminated by [0, 0].

name: MSP2_INAV_SERVO_MIXER
description: Retrieves the custom servo mixer rules, including programming framework condition IDs, for primary and secondary mixer profiles. Supersedes MSP_SERVO_MIX_RULES.

fields.name: conditionId
fields.description: Logic Condition ID (0 to MAX_LOGIC_CONDITIONS - 1, or 255/-1 if none/disabled).

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_SERVO_MIXER
description: Sets a single custom servo mixer rule, including programming framework condition ID. Supersedes MSP_SET_SERVO_MIX_RULE.

fields.name: ruleIndex
fields.description: Index of the rule to set (0 to MAX_SERVO_RULES - 1).

fields.name: conditionId
fields.description: Logic Condition ID (255/-1 if none). Ignored if USE_PROGRAMMING_FRAMEWORK is disabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_LOGIC_CONDITIONS
description: Retrieves the configuration of all defined Logic Conditions.

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if the condition is enabled.

fields.name: activatorId
fields.description: ID of the activator condition (if any, 255 if none).

fields.name: operation
fields.description: Enum (logicConditionOp_e): Logical operation (AND, OR, XOR, etc.).

fields.name: operandAType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of the first operand (Flight Mode, GVAR, etc.).

fields.name: operandBType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of the second operand.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_LOGIC_CONDITIONS
description: Sets the configuration for a single Logic Condition by its index.

fields.name: conditionIndex
fields.description: Index of the condition to set (0 to MAX_LOGIC_CONDITIONS - 1).

name: MSP2_INAV_LOGIC_CONDITIONS_STATUS
description: Retrieves the current evaluated status (true/false or numerical value) of all logic conditions.

fields.name: conditionValues
fields.description: Array of current values for each logic condition (logicConditionGetValue(i)). 1 for true, 0 for false, or numerical value depending on operation.

name: MSP2_INAV_GVAR_STATUS
description: Retrieves the current values of all Global Variables (GVARS).

fields.name: gvarValues
fields.description: Array of current values for each global variable (gvGet(i)).

name: MSP2_INAV_PROGRAMMING_PID
description: Retrieves the configuration of all Programming PIDs.

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if the PID is enabled.

fields.name: setpointType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of the setpoint source.

fields.name: measurementType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of the measurement source.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_PROGRAMMING_PID
description: Sets the configuration for a single Programming PID by its index.

fields.name: pidIndex
fields.description: Index of the Programming PID to set (0 to MAX_PROGRAMMING_PID_COUNT - 1).

fields.name: setpointType
fields.description: Enum: Type of the setpoint source.

fields.name: measurementType
fields.description: Enum: Type of the measurement source.

name: MSP2_INAV_PROGRAMMING_PID_STATUS
description: Retrieves the current output value of all Programming PIDs.

fields.name: pidOutputs
fields.description: Array of current output values for each Programming PID (programmingPidGetOutput(i)).

name: MSP2_PID
description: Retrieves the standard PID controller gains (P, I, D, FF) for the current PID profile.

name: MSP2_SET_PID
description: Sets the standard PID controller gains (P, I, D, FF) for the current PID profile.

name: MSP2_INAV_OPFLOW_CALIBRATION
description: Starts the optical flow sensor calibration procedure.

name: MSP2_INAV_FWUPDT_PREPARE
description: Prepares the flight controller to receive a firmware update via MSP.

fields.name: firmwareSize
fields.description: Total size of the incoming firmware file in bytes.

name: MSP2_INAV_FWUPDT_STORE
description: Stores a chunk of firmware data received via MSP.

name: MSP2_INAV_FWUPDT_EXEC
description: Executes the firmware update process (flashes the stored firmware and reboots).

fields.name: updateType
fields.description: Type of update (e.g., full flash, specific section - currently ignored/unused).

name: MSP2_INAV_FWUPDT_ROLLBACK_PREPARE
description: Prepares the flight controller to perform a firmware rollback to the previously stored version.

name: MSP2_INAV_FWUPDT_ROLLBACK_EXEC
description: Executes the firmware rollback process (flashes the stored backup firmware and reboots).

name: MSP2_INAV_SAFEHOME
description: Get or Set configuration for a specific Safe Home location.

fields.name: safehomeIndex
fields.description: Index of the safe home location (0 to MAX_SAFE_HOMES - 1).

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if this safe home is enabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_SAFEHOME
description: Sets the configuration for a specific Safe Home location.

fields.name: safehomeIndex
fields.description: Index of the safe home location (0 to MAX_SAFE_HOMES - 1).

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Boolean: 1 to enable this safe home.

name: MSP2_INAV_MISC2
description: Retrieves miscellaneous runtime information including timers and throttle status.

fields.name: autoThrottleFlag
fields.description: 1 if navigation is controlling throttle, 0 otherwise (navigationIsControllingThrottle()).

name: MSP2_INAV_LOGIC_CONDITIONS_SINGLE
description: Gets the configuration for a single Logic Condition by its index.

fields.name: conditionIndex
fields.description: Index of the condition to retrieve (0 to MAX_LOGIC_CONDITIONS - 1).

name: MSP2_INAV_ESC_RPM
description: Retrieves the RPM reported by each ESC via telemetry.

name: MSP2_INAV_ESC_TELEM
description: Retrieves the full telemetry data structure reported by each ESC.

fields.name: escData
fields.description: Array of escSensorData_t structures containing voltage, current, temp, RPM, errors etc. for each ESC.

name: MSP2_INAV_LED_STRIP_CONFIG_EX
description: Retrieves the full configuration for each LED on the strip using the ledConfig_t structure. Supersedes MSP_LED_STRIP_CONFIG.

fields.name: ledConfig
fields.description: Full configuration structure for the LED.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_LED_STRIP_CONFIG_EX
description: Sets the configuration for a single LED on the strip using the ledConfig_t structure. Supersedes MSP_SET_LED_STRIP_CONFIG.

fields.name: ledIndex
fields.description: Index of the LED to configure (0 to LED_MAX_STRIP_LENGTH - 1).

fields.name: ledConfig
fields.description: Full configuration structure for the LED.

name: MSP2_INAV_FW_APPROACH
description: Get or Set configuration for a specific Fixed Wing Autoland approach.

fields.name: approachIndex
fields.description: Index of the approach setting (0 to MAX_FW_LAND_APPOACH_SETTINGS - 1).

fields.name: landAlt
fields.description: Altitude for the final landing phase.

fields.name: approachDirection
fields.description: Direction of approach (From WP, Specific Heading).

fields.name: landHeading1
fields.description: Primary landing heading (if approachDirection requires it).

fields.name: landHeading2
fields.description: Secondary landing heading (if approachDirection requires it).

fields.name: isSeaLevelRef
fields.description: 1 if altitudes are relative to sea level, 0 if relative to home.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_FW_APPROACH
description: Sets the configuration for a specific Fixed Wing Autoland approach.

fields.name: approachIndex
fields.description: Index of the approach setting (0 to MAX_FW_LAND_APPOACH_SETTINGS - 1).

name: MSP2_INAV_GPS_UBLOX_COMMAND
description: Sends a raw command directly to a U-Blox GPS module connected to the FC.

fields.name: ubxCommand
fields.description: Raw U-Blox UBX protocol command frame (including header, class, ID, length, payload, checksum).

name: MSP2_INAV_RATE_DYNAMICS
description: Retrieves Rate Dynamics configuration parameters for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_RATE_DYNAMICS
description: Sets Rate Dynamics configuration parameters for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP2_INAV_EZ_TUNE
description: Retrieves the current EZ-Tune parameters.

fields.name: axisRatio
fields.description: Roll vs Pitch axis tuning ratio (ezTune()->axisRatio).

name: MSP2_INAV_EZ_TUNE_SET
description: Sets the EZ-Tune parameters and triggers an update.

name: MSP2_INAV_SELECT_MIXER_PROFILE
description: Selects the active mixer profile and saves configuration.

fields.name: mixerProfileIndex
fields.description: Index of the mixer profile to activate (0-based).

name: MSP2_ADSB_VEHICLE_LIST
description: Retrieves the list of currently tracked ADSB (Automatic Dependent Surveillance–Broadcast) vehicles.

fields.name: maxVehicles
fields.description: Maximum number of vehicles tracked (MAX_ADSB_VEHICLES). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

fields.name: callsignLength
fields.description: Maximum length of callsign string (ADSB_CALL_SIGN_MAX_LENGTH). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

fields.name: totalVehicleMsgs
fields.description: Total vehicle messages received (getAdsbStatus()->vehiclesMessagesTotal). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

fields.name: totalHeartbeatMsgs
fields.description: Total heartbeat messages received (getAdsbStatus()->heartbeatMessagesTotal). 0 if USE_ADSB disabled.

name: MSP2_INAV_CUSTOM_OSD_ELEMENTS
description: Retrieves counts related to custom OSD elements defined by the programming framework.

fields.name: maxTextLength
fields.description: Maximum length of the text part (OSD_CUSTOM_ELEMENT_TEXT_SIZE - 1).

fields.name: maxParts
fields.description: Maximum number of parts per element (CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_PARTS).

name: MSP2_INAV_CUSTOM_OSD_ELEMENT
description: Gets the configuration of a single custom OSD element defined by the programming framework.

fields.name: elementIndex
fields.description: Index of the custom element (0 to MAX_CUSTOM_ELEMENTS - 1).

fields.name: partType
fields.description: Enum (customElementType_e): Type of this part (Text, Variable, Symbol).

fields.name: partValue
fields.description: Value/ID associated with this part (GVAR index, Symbol ID, etc.).

fields.name: visibilityType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of visibility condition source.

fields.name: visibilityValue
fields.description: Value/ID of the visibility condition source (e.g., Logic Condition ID).

fields.name: elementText
fields.description: Static text part of the element (null padding likely).

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_CUSTOM_OSD_ELEMENTS
description: Sets the configuration of a single custom OSD element defined by the programming framework.

fields.name: elementIndex
fields.description: Index of the custom element (0 to MAX_CUSTOM_ELEMENTS - 1).

fields.name: visibilityType
fields.description: Enum (logicOperandType_e): Type of visibility condition source.

fields.name: visibilityValue
fields.description: Value/ID of the visibility condition source.

fields.name: elementText
fields.description: Static text part of the element.

name: MSP2_INAV_OUTPUT_MAPPING_EXT2
description: Retrieves the full extended output mapping configuration (timer ID, full 32-bit usage flags, and pin label). Supersedes MSP2_INAV_OUTPUT_MAPPING_EXT.

fields.name: timerId
fields.description: Hardware timer identifier (e.g., TIM1, TIM2). SITL uses index.

fields.name: pinLabel
fields.description: Label for special pin usage (PIN_LABEL_ enum, e.g., PIN_LABEL_LED). 0 (PIN_LABEL_NONE) otherwise.

name: MSP2_INAV_SERVO_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration parameters for all supported servos (min, max, middle, rate). Supersedes MSP_SERVO_CONFIGURATIONS.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_SERVO_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration parameters for a single servo. Supersedes MSP_SET_SERVO_CONFIGURATION.

fields.name: servoIndex
fields.description: Index of the servo to configure (0 to MAX_SUPPORTED_SERVOS - 1).

name: MSP2_INAV_GEOZONE
description: Get configuration for a specific Geozone.

fields.name: geozoneIndex
fields.description: Index of the geozone (0 to MAX_GEOZONES_IN_CONFIG - 1).

fields.name: minAltitude
fields.description: Minimum allowed altitude within the zone (cm).

fields.name: maxAltitude
fields.description: Maximum allowed altitude within the zone (cm).

fields.name: isSeaLevelRef
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if altitudes are relative to sea level, 0 if relative to home.

fields.name: fenceAction
fields.description: Enum (GEOZONE_ACTION_): Action to take upon boundary violation.

fields.name: vertexCount
fields.description: Number of vertices defined for this zone.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_GEOZONE
description: Sets the main configuration for a specific Geozone (type, shape, altitude, action). This command resets (clears) all vertices associated with the zone.

fields.name: geozoneIndex
fields.description: Index of the geozone (0 to MAX_GEOZONES_IN_CONFIG - 1).

fields.name: vertexCount
fields.description: Number of vertices to be defined (used for validation later).

name: MSP2_INAV_GEOZONE_VERTEX
description: Get a specific vertex (or center+radius for circular zones) of a Geozone.

fields.name: vertexId
fields.description: Index of the vertex within the zone (0-based). For circles, 0 = center.

name: MSP2_INAV_SET_GEOZONE_VERTEX
description: Sets a specific vertex (or center+radius for circular zones) for a Geozone.

name: MSP2_BETAFLIGHT_BIND
description: Initiates the receiver binding procedure for supported serial protocols (CRSF, SRXL2).
